content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(40.5, -82.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- None (no structures have been built yet)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when attempting to place entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. In this case, you need a burner mining drill to place it at the specified location.
- Check the recipe requirements for crafting entities to ensure you have the necessary materials available.
